text.title: Get Past the Ending of a Book

head.s: Get Past the Ending of a Book

p.s: How can you get over the ending of a book ?
Many people are so obsessed with books that it 's hard not to think of it 's ending and get over it .
Here 's a few ways that may help you .

list.item:
Know that the ending chosen is possibly the best ending there is .
Authors work very hard writing and rewriting the book .
A good ending could even get them more reads , so there 's a good reason they chose to end it this way .
It serves the theme of the book .

item.s: Read what the author has to say about it .
If the book has a sad\unexpected ending , chances are you 're not the only one who ca n't get over it !
Readers must have been asked why they chose that ending .
Hearing the author 's point of view can ease you into it .

figure.rend: Get Past the Ending of a Book Step 2.jpg

item.s: Read other comments of other obsessed readers and see what they think .
You 'll either find people who support your idea , which will make you feel better , or you 'll find people with other opinions .
Argue with them .
See who 's right .

figure.rend: Get Past the Ending of a Book Step 3.jpg

item.s: Read other books , either of that same author or someone else .
Do you like the book ? Go ahead and check out more similar books .
You 're probably only upset because you like the book .
Go get another one ; you might get over it sooner than you think .
In fact , as soon as you become obsessed with a new book , you 'll forget about the old one .

figure.rend: Get Past the Ending of a Book Step 4.jpg

item.s: Write your own ending .
Still think the ending is unfair ? than simply make your own ending .
Rewrite the book your own way in which you find a different route the author never thought of .
It 'll feel better and you can always think of your version as the original one .
You can also go and share it on different writing sites that might enjoy your fanfiction ( like Quotev and Wattpad . ) Maybe you 'll even get published .

figure.rend: Get Past the Ending of a Book Step 5.jpg

list.item:
Reread the books and think of why the author chose that ending .
There must be a reason .

item.s: Know that you 're not the only one getting frustrated over books .
Talk to a friend and get them to read the book also .
Talk to fellow fans .
Have a rant about it in your blog , the author 's blog or social networks .
In the end , it 's only a book , do n't let it control you .
Go on doing your everyday routines and you 'll forget about it soon .

list.item:
Talking to random people about a book 's ending and freaking out may make you look like a crazy person .
